entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
